Quiz_Details: The Quiz is all about the Abstract Data type (ADT)

Quiz_Questions.question: is a type (or class) for objects whose behavior is defined by a set of value and a set of operations.
A ___ contains elements of same type arranged in sequential order and following operations can be performed on the list.
A ___ contains elements of same type arranged in sequential order. All operations takes place at a single end that is top of the stack
A _____ contains elements of same type arranged in sequential order. Operations takes place at both ends, insertion is done at end and deletion is done at front
